patterns: I need help with maths, how you can do
responses: I can guide you through maths problems: algebra, trigonometry, graphs, shapes and probability. Please tell which topic you want....

Algebra is a branch of mathematics that deals with symbols and rules for manipulating those symbols. Algebra involves algebraic expressions or manipulating equations. Studying algebra helps you to think logically and critically to solve many problems both in studies and in real-life situations. Navigating to algebra module....

Trigonometry is a branch of mathematics that studies relationships between side lengths and angles of triangles. The six trigonometric ratios are sine (sin), cosine (cos), tangent (tan), cotangent (cot), cosecant (cosec), and secant (sec). In geometry, trigonometry is a branch of mathematics that deals with the sides and angles of a right-angled triangle. Therefore, trig ratios are evaluated with respect to sides and angles.

A diagram in which a line or a curve shows the relationship between two quantities, measurements, etc. And a graph can be defined as a pictorial representation or a diagram that represents data or values in an organized manner....
